sen.e: In other words, the Edo bakufu was not a dictatorship of the Tokugawa shogun himself, but was a dictatorship in the framework of the Tokugawa family.

sen.j: またこの事により、あまり政治に関与しなかった将軍であっても、幕閣の完全な傀儡になる事はなく、政権の簒奪も未然に防止することが可能となった。
sen.e: Due to this fact, even the shogun who was not deeply involved in politics did not become a complete puppet of the cabinet officials of the Shogunate, and therefore the usurpation of the administration could be prevented.
